wizard.same-password: Le mot de passe et le mot de passe de confirmation doivent correspondre

codes.101: The amount {{amount}} CKB is too small, please enter an amount no less than 61 CKB.
codes.104: Fail to connect to the node, please restart Neuron.
codes.105: You need more capacities for change (at least 61 CKBytes), or click 'Max' button to send all your balance.
codes.106: You need more capacities for change (at least 61 CKBytes), or slide to the end to send all your balance.
codes.203: $t(messages.fields.{{fieldName}}) {{fieldValue}} is too long, it should be shorter than or equal to {{length}}.
codes.204: $t(messages.fields.{{fieldName}}) {{fieldValue}} is too short, it should be longer than or equal to {{length}}.
codes.206: $t(messages.fields.{{fieldName}}) {{fieldValue}} is invalid, please enter the $t(messages.fields.{{fieldName}}) with no more than {{length}} decimal places.
codes.207: $t(messages.fields.{{fieldName}}) {{fieldValue}} is invalid, it cannot be negative.
codes.208: $t(messages.fields.{{fieldName}}) {{fieldValue}} is invalid, it should start with http(s)://

sync.sync-not-start: Sync not started yet, please try to restart Neuron Wallet

nervos-dao.notice-wait-time: Notice: You need to wait {{epochs}} epochs {{blocks}} blocks(~{{days}} days) to complete the withdraw.
nervos-dao.deposit-terms: Nervos DAO needs 102 CKBytes for deposit cell storage, which is not compensation-bearing. Please visit the <0>Nervos DAO RFC</0> for more information about Nervos DAO
nervos-dao.minimal-fee-required: The minimum deposit capacity is {{minimal}} CKBytes
nervos-dao.withdraw-alert: Hint: these are only {{epochs}} epochs (~{{hours}} hours) until the end of your current lock period. If you wish to withdraw in current lock period, please send withdraw request in time. There are {{nextLeftEpochs}} epochs(~{{days}} days) until the end of your next lock period.
nervos-dao.insufficient-period-alert-message: Only mature header can be referenced in transactions(Matureness requires 4 epochs, around 16 hours)
nervos-dao.detailed-explanation-of-epochs-period: A compensation period in Nervos DAO consists of 180 epochs (estimated 30 days). Users may apply unlock for their deposits any time during every compensation period, then withdraw their deposits and compensations when that compensation period ends. It is worth mentioning that the compensations will stop accumulating as soon as users apply unlock. So we suggest that users apply unlock for their deposits at a time that closes enough to the end of a compensation period.
nervos-dao.terms-in-explanation-of-epochs-period:
If you did not apply unlock during this compensation period, the next compensation period will start automatically.
It is suggested that users apply unlock during YELLOW epochs.

updates.update-not-available: There are currently no updates available.
updates.updates-found-do-you-want-to-update: An update ({{version}}) is available, do you want to download and install now?
updates.updates-downloaded-about-to-quit-and-ins: Update downloaded. Ready to install and relaunch.
